title: I Bought A Refurbished Steam Deck From Steam...
description: Check out the Microcenter links:  -Micro Center Miami is Officially OPEN:  -Shop Micro Centers Top Deals:  -Build Your PC with Micro Centers PC Builder:   It was way harder to buy this refurbished Steam Deck from Steam.  The link to the refurb Steam deck site:   Get some AWESOME Dawid T-shirts, Mouse pads and more here:   Play some Minecraft on the Dawid Does Minecraft server courtesy of our friends at Linode! Dawid Does Minecraft Name: Mctenthiddy, server IP: mc.tenthiddy.com It works on Java version 1.19.3  Support the channel on Patreon:    *Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate* Discord:  Twitch:  Twitch bits on YouTube:
